languages.text: Экипаж получит воинское снаряжение и сможет проявить себя, разделавшись с врагами Лорд-капитана
The crew will receive military gear and a chance to prove their worth by dispatching the Lord Captain's enemies.
languages.original_text: Экипаж получит воинское снаряжение и сможет проявить себя, разделавшись с врагами Лорд-капитана

traits.locale_text: The crew will receive military gear and a chance to prove their worth by dispatching the Lord Captain's enemies.
The crew will receive military gear and a chance to prove their worth by dispatching the Lord Captain's enemies.
The crew will receive military gear and a chance to prove their worth by dispatching the Lord Captain's enemies.
The crew will receive military gear and a chance to prove their worth by dispatching the Lord Captain's enemies.
The crew will receive military gear and a chance to prove their worth by dispatching the Lord Captain's enemies.

languages.text: 船员们会收到军用装备的支援，有机会击败领主舰长的敌人，证明自己的价值。
languages.original_text: The crew will receive military gear and a chance to prove their worth by dispatching the Lord Captain's enemies.

traits.locale_text: 船员们会收到军用装备的支援，有机会击败领主舰长的敌人，证明自己的价值。

languages.text: La tripulación recibirá equipo militar y tendrá la oportunidad de demostrar su valía acabando con los enemigos {mf|del|de la} Lord Capitán.
languages.original_text: The crew will receive military gear and a chance to prove their worth by dispatching the Lord Captain's enemies.

traits.locale_text: La tripulación recibirá equipo militar y tendrá la oportunidad de demostrar su valía acabando con los enemigos {mf|del|de la} Lord Capitán.

languages.text: クルーは軍の装備と、ロード・キャプテンの敵を素早く始末して、己の価値を証明するチャンスを与えられた。
languages.original_text: The crew will receive military gear and a chance to prove their worth by dispatching the Lord Captain's enemies.

traits.locale_text: クルーは軍の装備と、ロード・キャプテンの敵を素早く始末して、己の価値を証明するチャンスを与えられた。

languages.text: De l'équipement militaire sera envoyé à l'équipage, qui aura une chance de prouver sa valeur en éliminant les ennemis {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine}.
languages.original_text: The crew will receive military gear and a chance to prove their worth by dispatching the Lord Captain's enemies.

traits.locale_text: De l'équipement militaire sera envoyé à l'équipage, qui aura une chance de prouver sa valeur en éliminant les ennemis {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine}.

languages.text: Die Crew wird militärische Ausrüstung erhalten — und die Chance, ihren Wert zu beweisen, indem sie die Feinde des Lord Captains besiegt.
languages.original_text: The crew will receive military gear and a chance to prove their worth by dispatching the Lord Captain's enemies.

traits.locale_text: Die Crew wird militärische Ausrüstung erhalten — und die Chance, ihren Wert zu beweisen, indem sie die Feinde des Lord Captains besiegt.

languages.text: Mürettebat, askerî teçhizat kuşanarak Lord Kaptan'ın düşmanlarını yok etme şansına mazhar olacak.
languages.original_text: The crew will receive military gear and a chance to prove their worth by dispatching the Lord Captain's enemies.
